text.text_translated:
Is graffiti art or vandalism?  
It depends on your view.  
In many countries, writing on public buildings and walls is vandalism.  
Writing on buildings that belong to a person is also vandalism.  
Police often stop street artists.  
Some artists have to pay fines.  
City councils complain about the high cost.  
Cleaning graffiti from buildings costs a lot.  
Cleaning graffiti from buses and trains also costs a lot.
